title: ADR Adoption Status
description: Per-library adoption status for ecosystem ADRs. Tracks implementation progress across language foundations (gofulmen, pyfulmen, tsfulmen, etc.).

adoptionDescriptions.not-applicable: This ADR does not apply to this library/language (e.g., Go-specific decision tracked in Python library).
adoptionDescriptions.planned: Implementation planned but not started. May have design notes or tracking issue.
adoptionDescriptions.in-progress: Active implementation underway. May have partial functionality available.
adoptionDescriptions.implemented: Fully implemented according to ADR specification. Ready for testing and validation.
adoptionDescriptions.verified: Implemented and validated through tests, production use, or peer review. Recommended status.
adoptionDescriptions.deferred: Implementation postponed due to dependencies, priorities, or technical constraints. Include rationale.

sortOrder.description: Numeric sort order for adoption status. Lower numbers indicate earlier stages. Enables comparative operations and progress tracking.

active-adoption.description: Library is actively working on or has completed adoption

$comment: Used in library-specific tracking (e.g., gofulmen's implementation of Crucible ADR-0001). Enables adoption matrix visualization.
